name: Avoid declaring null arrays; prefer to set to empty (EGL)
description: This rule searches for all programs declaring null arrays
output: This report lists the following information: Program full name, Number of Null Arrays
rationale: Make sure you start with an empty dynamic array (array exists, but doesnt have any entries) rather than a null array (array doesnt exist). Declare your array variable with a dimension of 0 or attribute clause or assign a not null array to the variable.
reference: EGL Best Practices: Coding For Performance. November 10, 2009. Edition 2
remediation: Try to reduce the use the declaration of null arrays.
